data.title: Rob Brydon At 50
meta_keywords: Rob Brydon At 50 guide cast details episodes information Documentary BBC One Wales 2015 Rob Brydon At Fifty; Rob Brydon 50 Rob Brydon Steve Coogan Ruth Jones David Walliams Tom Jones David Mitchell Howard Jones Joy Jones
data.meta_description: A guide to Rob Brydon At 50, the 2015 BBC One Wales TV documentary. Documentary looking at the comedy career of Rob Brydon, including an interview with the star himself.
data.text:
Welsh comedian, actor and presenter Rob Brydon retraces his rocky road to success, from his early days in Porthcawl to the bright lights of Hollywood.

Featuring a host of famous friends that joined Rob on his journey including Sir Tom Jones, Steve Coogan, Ruth Jones and David Walliams.
